title: Episode 350 - ZK in Solana with Mert Mumtaz

rawLines.text: [Music]
welcome to zero knowledge I'm your host
Anna Rose in this podcast we will be
exploring the latest in zero knowledge
research and the decentralized web as
well as new paradigms that promise to
change the way we interact and transact
[Music]
online this week drun and I chat with
mumtaz mert is the co-founder and CEO at
helus and someone who is known on
Twitter as one of the most vocal
supporters of the salana ecosystem in
our conversation we cover Mert's

start living through the crash at the

discuss its positioning in the larger

some time to do a survey of ZK projects

covering ways that ZK has been used for
scaling
privacy as well as in the Bas layer to

something I've wanted to cover for a

about the past present and future of
speculative assets the impact of meme
coins and what could be next now
obviously this is a little out of
character for the show we almost never
touch these topics but since we do in
this episode I will make the note that
this is in no way Financial advice
nothing we say here should influence any
personal choices you make about
investing

want to just let you know about the ZK

happening on May 12th in Toronto this is
the second time we bring the ZK Summit
to North America the first being all the
way back in 2019 when we did one in San
Francisco if you've never been to a ZK

even more limited so do get your
application in early and we'll get in
touch with you very shortly links as
always are in the show notes and I hope
to see you there now here is our episode
with
